rescuecore2.connection

Interface ConnectionListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MessageQueueConnectionListener

    public interface ConnectionListener
    Interface for classes interested in hearing about events on Connection objects.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void messageReceived(Connection c, Message msg)
      Notification that a message was received.

    • Method Detail

      • messageReceived

        void messageReceived(Connection c,
                   Message msg)
        Notification that a message was received.
        Parameters:
        c - The Connection that the message arrived on.
        msg - The Message that arrived.
